scripts.zlib: cd cpp_modules/zlib && make clean && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=dist . && make install
scripts.ssl: cd cpp_modules/openssl && ./config shared --prefix=`pwd`/openssl --openssldir=`pwd`/openssl/openssl && make && make install
scripts.urlcpp: cd cpp_modules/urlcpp && mkdir -p test && cnpm install && pwd && make -f Makefile all
scripts.fmt: cd cpp_modules/fmt && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=../dist .. && make install
scripts.build: cd test && pwd && which make && make -j 3 -f Makefile all
scripts.test: cnpm build && cd test && pwd && ./test --test-case='test writing mol2 from 1ebcs hem'
scripts.lib: mkdir -p build/src/parsing && mkdir -p build/src/standards && mkdir -p build/src/constitution && mkdir -p build/src/density && mkdir -p build/src/lattice && mkdir -p build/src/symmetry && mkdir -p build/src/reading/tcp && mkdir -p build/src/publishing/jgf && mkdir -p build/src/publishing/gz && mkdir -p build/src/publishing/st && mkdir -p build/src/utils && which make && make -j 3 -f Makefile all
